content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten home for the evening and was taking the puppy outside to do her business. at this time there was still twilight. after i had walked back something caught my eye just above the trees. i said to myself, "hey what is that"? i ruled out the possibility of it being an airplane. in the back of my mind i was thinking drone. i then noticed it was two magenta orbs paired together with a little bit of space between the two (golfball sized). i quickly ruled out all other possibilities realizing that what i saw may genuinely be a ufo. i felt intrigued, curious, afraid, excited. it was silently hovering about 10-20 feet above the tree line and about less than a mile away from my point of view. it lasted about 15 seconds and then moved away from it's hovering position at the same rate of speed you would turn off a dimmer switch.
content.summary: It looked like a pair of two orbs with a halo around the pair

content.detailedDescription: While driving west on a county road in central texas my brother and i spotted an object that fell from the sky it came across from left to right maybe 200 yards away, then in an instant took off in and almost straight upward descent, from the time it started upward to disappearing it took maybe a second and there was no noise it looked as if it was an afterburner or something close too it but was way to fast to be a normal jet. a couple months later or so my brother and his wife spotted the same light moving across the horizon at the same quick speed only a couple miles from where we first spotted the ufo.
content.summary: Ufo spotted moving quick

content.detailedDescription:
Stood outside with my wife for a cigarette, observed bright light moving from sw, wobbling, ascending and descending for the duration. the light was bright white, but seemed to have an orange-red hue as it was flying away in front of us to the sw.

its elevation and direction changed randomly, the object made no sound and appeared to be travelling well in excess of 3-5x the speed of modern combat fighter aircraft (i live on a military base, and have served in the canadian military for 13 years.)

i tried to film a zoomed in video of the object as it was flying away, although nothing notable could be determined from the video other than the light. i was hoping to catch it make some kind of strange turn in direction or height etc, but it kept travelling to the north west over the tree line and out of sight.

i have a short 20s film of the object on cell phone camera, but it is very difficult to determine anything.

the object and entire event lasted less than 2 minutes as it flew from my extreme right of view from my front door to the left out of sight. exceptional speed.
content.summary: Bright static white light approached from sw headed ne with random directional changes, extremely fast and effortless - no sound.

content.detailedDescription: We were in jersey city nj when we observed a light in the sky. as the light passed over us, we started to notice more flying above us. they were flying from southwest toward northeast, toward the downtown area.  there were sixteen all together, but in the middle there were four in formation. several flew toward the east while the remaining after the formation ascended into the sky and out of sight. they were not moving as fast as a helicopter because a helicopter had passed during and after the sighting. they also made no noise. it is very unusual for helicopters to be out at that time because the weather was rainy and they do not usually fly at night in this area.
content.summary: Observed a lights in the sky, no sound, flying separately then 4 in formation like a diamond then more in single file behind.  we have a video of this.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufos have been filmed in the city of tyumen.
they appeared on different parts of the sky.
covered part of the sky from the east to the south.

when checking the position and time in the program stellarium, there was no satellites flew.

in the sixth minute is presented very bright ufo object was flying with the iss rate of about 4 km per second.
ufos is not the iss, the station flew only half an hour later.
content.summary: Night vision filming n ufos july 28, 2016

content.detailedDescription:
Ufos have been filmed in the city of tyumen.
they appeared different parts of the sky.
possessed part of the sky from the east to the south.

when checking the position and time in the program stallarium, there was no satellites flew.
content.summary: Ufos monitoring of night sky july 26, 2016 night vision video

content.detailedDescription: I was swimming in lake erie near the perry nuclear power plant. i saw a gray sphere come out of the cloud of steam that was coming out of the cooling tower. it rose up into the air and slowly moved north. after a while it descended down onto the water and landed on the water. i thought that it could be a balloon. i was perplexed because i never saw anything like that before. it was still floating on the water in the distance and i swam back to shore and went home.
content.summary: Gray sphere came out of nuclear power plant

content.detailedDescription: I was talking to a friend on the phone a couple of days before my family's first christmas in our first home. we bought a home in the country to enjoy the quiet and safety for our kids and pets. i went outside to take the call because the kids were excited about presents and we're running around the living room. i stood on the deck and looked up as i talked. i noticed planes going back and forth, but not asending or desending the slightest. i lost sight when they each were too far away to see. i asked my friend if he knew where any airports were in amelia. he said he didn't. later, i found there are no airports and the closest one is in powhatan, but i believe it is only for private planes. i could be wrong, but upon internet sesrch, this is what i read. amelia is very underdeveloped. powhatan is about an hour from us and although it also has no city and has a lot of farm land, it's a bit more developed than amelia. i highly doubt we could see planes coming and going from richmond. they have a large airport. my first thought was, 'wow, a lot of people are traveling to see family for holiday.' i began to count as i talked to my friend, but didn't tell him what started to come to mind. my heart was beating out of my chest as they flew with hardly any distance apart from each other. there was no way at all i could say the distance they were from me/the ground. they had blinking lights, some white and some a reddish orange. because they were going both ways, it was difficult for me to be sure i wasn't counting some of them more than once, but i do know there were at least 200 and that's when i stopped and just kept watching. all night they never stopped. after hanging up with my friend i sat outside and continued to watch. i tried to take a cell phone picture, but it was just a blurry pinpoint of nothing. upon looking at it, it could have been anything. that phone is broken and long gone. i felt if i showed family, they would think i was crazy and tell me it was an airplane. eventually i went in and asked my husband about airports. he had very little information. i looked online to see if va was having any air shows anywhere, but couldn't find anything. i told just a handful of people on my facebook 'saw hundreds of lights in the sky tonight. anyone else?' only my older sister responded with, 'hello! didn't you people just read this! wow!' but no one, including me, ever said anything about it ever again. my then 11-year-old son believed in aliens and said they had visited him once, so i told him and he believed me and has never forgotten. i don't believe he was visited because we adopted him at age 6 and he was born addicted to every drug imaginable and he is schizophrenic. i never wanted to tell anyone because i've always been the black sheep in the family and i  didn't want them to think i was lying, crazy or trying to get attention. that is not my charecter at all. i finally decided to somewhat come out (to mufon at least) sense i have stage 4 cancer and nothing to lose. if i can help uncover the truth with my one small story, i hope it will be helpful in the tiniest way. i would love to know if anyone in my area also saw these hundreds of lights in the sky a couple days before christmas of 2014. thank you for reading and for all you do!
content.summary: More than 200 blinking lights all flying in the same direction. if not for the multitude, i would have dismissed them as plains.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from taking my sister to work at one of our family stores when i noticed these what looked like paper in the air high above the highway. as i got closer i noticed they had stopped sorta and were manuerving back and forth. at that point i was floored. broad daylight these things were so bright white i immediately pulled over. turned on my i phone video camera and the video speaks for itself. i felt as if they wanted to be looked at don't know why i felt that way but i even state it in the video. i was sorry no one else was stopping to look at them because whatever it was it was showing off for sure. there were like 30 or more of these things they flew in what looked like formation so at first that why i thought they might  just be birds. once i stopped and focused on them they were making shapes like one shape they made together appeared to be and arrow another one looked like an old satellite dish and so many more i was over whelmed with this feeling of joy while watching them. the material they must be made from had a very cloakish type look from one minute to the next. i could see them then i could not . i really would love someone to analyze my video because you will surely see the most amazing things they did.  at about guess 6 minutes into it i have this overwhelming feeling that i needed to hurry down the highway and that i would be able to see them once more before they left. i keep the camera rolling never stopping footage. sure enough and right in front of a highway sign showing you where i am they reappear and do more amazing shapes they move right left up down turns no aircraft moves like this only birds. but you will see in video there is no wings actually ever flapping. they just look like huge flat pieces of paper. they were incredible at one point as they disappear from my visual i beg them to come back and show me one more time and sure enough they come around on my right side and come up so close you definitely at that point see they are some foreign object. whatever they were they were fantastic and this was my finest moment because i have seen more then this but this one i caught on video. truly amazing and i was not scared of these at all. i have seen others types of ufo's since then as well. a few days later i was over my sisters house and while swimming i was floating on my back and noticed a big silver ball way up above us i asked my nephew and my brother in law if they were seeing the same thing that i was and they were so i know there was something there.I am always looking up always have since i was small.
content.summary: Thought they might of been birds at first but these were no birds. they were like huge sheets of white paper and there were like 30 of them and they moved so fluidly making different shapes together

content.detailedDescription:
1. readying up for a short stroll with my dad, we were in the front yard when we saw it. cloudless day in april. 

2. we regularly watch airplanes, and this time we noticed something strange

3. an f16 of the dutch airforce. highly irregular event next to a passenger airplane, but possible. next moment it dawned on us that it couldnt be a f16 because lack of contrail and wings. the size was roughly one-third of the airliner. color was same tint as the airplane. as all airplanes on that altitude seem to have to the naked eye.

4. it had the same speed of the airliner when it 'hovered' next to it, seemed to be at the same altitude as the airliner, about five seconds like that and then it suddenly slided forward in a fraction of a second, to abruptly adopt the same speed as the airplane again. roughly ~800m in front of the airplane, rightside. it stayed like that for a few seconds then it took off again in western direction at great speed and apparently instant acceleration. within 9 seconds it was gone in the horizon. 

it was a sunny day, it shimmered very brightly for about two seconds while it was on high speed darting off to the west. 

5. my mom and dad were the other witnesses. they were as confused as i. in the months after, i started having to have very vivid dreams about ufo's in the nightly sky while looking through my window. also observing triangle ufo's. all in my dreams. never been as vivid as before. it's like my subconscious trying to place this event.

6. horizon, it darted off until it was a black dot and then nothing. it disappeared by sheer distance.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ovalshaped, it hovered next to a high altitude passenger airplane (contrail level) as if studying it. ufo had no contrail.

content.detailedDescription: This is the second time i seen this ufo in 4 days. i seen it on the 22nd of july at 430am and then again on the 26th of july at 1130pm. i was on my mother's deck when i seen 6-8 lights fly over me. they were not as bright as i remembered. they  were a dull orange almost hazy but could clearly identify they were in a row and attached to one object. i yelled for my mom to come out and witness it. she was able to view the lights before it dissapered behind an enormous willow tree in the yard behind us. i told my mother about the first sighting and she was sceptical. after she witnessed it for herself she admitted she could not explain the lights and was shaken. asked me to stop going outside on the deck. worried the objet may come back. it was between 50-100 feet in length. we both heard a unfamiliar swishing light humming sound. very faint.I have been curious about ufo's but never sure of their existence until now. there is no explication for what we seen other than a ufo. my mother was a sceptic and thought ufo sightings to be nonsense and could always be explained until she witnessed those lights that evening. i did catch some other weird activity on the camera of my phone later that evening. it will not load to the website.
content.summary: The object had 6 to 8 light's flew over me low altitude and went out of site over a big willow tree

content.detailedDescription: I am serious and willing prove it with lie detector.Also ask sydney nova scotia radar base if i called that night.They told me zero aircraft on radar.
content.summary: Fly by with vertifed no radar and brother saw ot too go straight upwards

content.detailedDescription:
At 133 am i went outside to smoke a cigarette. i usually go onto the porch but for whatever reason i was compelled to go out front so that i could see the stars. immediately i noticed a peculiar light traveling e by ne. what was odd is that the craft had lights emitted from it in a pulsating randomized way. from what i could discern the craft had multiple lights blinking both white and reddish amber in color, but never at the same time. what was also odd is that every time the lights blinked, the craft appeared to be zig zagging while crossing th sky. it was like the craft disappeared and reappeared just inches from where it was just at, creating this zig zag pattern as it flew across the sky. the blinking of the lights was randomized and not in any discernable pattern, as far as i could tell. 
    for whatever reason i put my hand up into the air, as if trying the use my finger for a size reference. once i put my hand up, the behavior of the craft immediately changed. the blinking lights began to dissapate and the craft appeared to fading into oblivion. the very moment it faded away, an object appeared directly over my head and a brilliant yellow light flashed instantly and was roughly the size of a quarter (if i were to hold a quarter outstretched in my arm). after the light flashed, the sighting was over however the experience was not. 
    as i was witnessing the mysterious object my heart was pounding. i was overcome by excitement from having just witnessed what i truly believe to be a ufo. once the light flashed overhead, i was instantly overcome by a feeling of peace. just as i had the conscious thought of the newfound feeling i was experiencing, the wind began to pick up. i looked at the trees over the wall separating the street from my apartment, and they were calm. it were as if a sudden gust of wind was only in my near immediate vicinity. i also noticed it was completely quiet, almost eerily quiet. i live next to the main road and cars travel on it even at all times of night, although there is less traffic in the early hours of the morning. however after the light flashed it was almost as if i were standing in a vacuum. 
   as i stood there in complete awe of the spectacle i had just witnessed i began to feel an intense burning feeling in my big toe on my left foot. i looked down and saw no reason as to why my toe was hurting. it burned more intensely and stopped as suddenly as it began. 
    now i included what happened after witnessing the mysterious craft as i believe it to be pertinent to the sighting. this total experience left me startled to say the least. i was left with the impression that i was meant to see this, for what reason i may never know. i have seen many questionable objects over the past few months however this sighting stands out, not just because lights and object i had seen, but hat also happened afterward that i find to be highly unusual.
content.summary: Ufo flying in zig zag pattern

content.detailedDescription:
Observed light up lake 3 mile 10 de. above hor / came toward me rose to 40 de. above hor./ continued same alt. to over head, stepped out on porch with field glass

size - train locomotive
colour - black
shape - round with various large projections
light - projected from rear yellow orange energy pulse 
sound  - none
smell  - none
alt. over head 700 - 1000 ft.
air foil - none
props or rotor - none

continued on 4-6 mile at upward angle then up instantly at 80 de. angle  pin point and gone. 

have seen other strange things, was prepared to be as observant as possible. (ie) low alt. large lights in clear sky last 1-2 min. then instantly vanish.
content.summary: Passed over head 1000 ft went on then instantly up at 80 de. angle disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I saw sitting in the backyard and noticed what i thought was a strange constellation and it began to move.
content.summary: Clump of star like lights ascended into a diagonal line and then began to fade and move

content.detailedDescription: Standing in my friends driveway when we first noticed the light traveling in our direction. no flashing indicators like that of an airplane and completely silent. when it was at our side is when we started to see the abrupt changes in movement. at one point it stopped and hovered before once again making some serious maneuvers.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ball of light that rapidly changed directions, completely silent

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to make a delivery. i noticed the lights becouse its pitch black on that hwy at night. when i first noticed it i thought it was a dome mansion built into the mountain side. stationary lights with a silhouette of half of a pancake or half a circle. my feelings were excitement and curiosity then fear. i lost sight of it because it was stationary and i was driving past it.
content.summary: Im driving east on the 84 from oregon and sighted hovering lights as i was passing mile marker 23

content.detailedDescription: I was 15 sunny day. it was amazibg. unmactched today
content.summary: Changed my life i was scared to tell anyone

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work around 2030 pm ( the sun had not set yet) i was enjoying the view atop richmond rd, i observed to my east 3 small (distant) white round objects traveling together to form a triangle.  i pulled over briefly, and watched as the three objects flew towards the west and then changed direction in unison to fly towards the east and then were gone.
since the objects were probably atleast a mile away, they appeared quite small.   all three were the same size, (aspirin size from my perspective) and were flying apart from each other but did have the same coordinated flight path.
as they ascended to the west they flew behind some clouds and i lost sight of them.  the event took place in about 1-2 minutes.
content.summary: Driving home from work, still light out and noticed while i was atop richmond rd 3 white lights to the east

content.detailedDescription: The first object appeared about 50° on the western horizon, first mistaken for a satellite until a second appeared from 50° slightly  off to port side of the first and about a foot or so trailing behind from my perspective. both objects remained in perfect wingman formation silently whipping by from w-sw to n-ne. i have witnessed several space station fly-bys and a shuttle re- entry,  and both of these objects were certainly in the 20,000 mph range taking maybe 15-20 seconds to travel from 50°w to about 50°e. both objects faded out of sight at 50° which to me indicated they were not atmospheric,  if that was the case you could have followed them much lower on the horizon,  clear night no clouds. oddly enough in 09 i witnessed a similar event only much more dramatic where again a mistaken satellite headed north from south was suddenly what i perceived as attacked by two smaller  objects that incredibly quickly performed a rolling scissors like stunt,  there was a flash and the first bigger object kinda pulsated and strobed into a ring and faded out the emmited light was localized it did not illuminate the horizon,  the two smaller ones shot of in a blink out of sight. someone else had to have seen this one tonight,  right over the city and blatantly obvious.
content.summary: 1st appeared mistaken for satellite until a 2nd  appeared in formation slightly off to port side and trailing about a foot behind by my perspective

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 4:25 am i was outside standing on my deck at my residence where i reside with my father letting my dogs out. i
am also observing the stars and apon looking
up this morning i noticed what i thought at first was a satellite. while watching the 
i realized it was trailed by two other less 
brighter lites. the forward light was the 
brightest. they were very high altitude and
silent. there was no other aircraft in the area at time of sighting.
content.summary: Observed three lites move from sw to se early am.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend,had been working on a mutual friends garden during the day.We stayed over to complete the work the next day.Since both of us smoked,we went to the side kitchen door,and sat on the wall,that surrounds the back steps to the house,and kitchen door.I was talking to my friend tony,when i looked up and over his shoulder,i could see in the night sky a complete circular,swirling mass of what i first thought was a cloud.This thing was massive,i asked my m8,if he could see this,to which he answered yes.For some reason he was reluctant to look at it directly.As i observed this circular mass,i was aware that their was no clouds in the sky,apart from this ring,yet to the left of me stars were visible,but nothing could be seen in front of me apart from this ring.The mass was swirling in both a clockwise,and anti clockwise direction,and the outer edge was being pulled and curled inwards as if forming a wall within itself holding the circle completely in place.The centre of this ring was black,as black can be,nothing else was visible directly in front of me.I watched this swirling mass for what seemed ages,but was 15-20 seconds,when suddenly,this thing just blinked out and disappeared completely.I was in absolute awe of what i had just seen,and was trying to talk to my m8,when suddenly this from nowhere,this thing burst open again.It seemed to open from a single spot in space and create in a mini seconds this same circular swirling mass of cloud and light.I noticed that it had moved a small distance away from us,but still in the same height in the sky.I could'nt understand how it was generating its own mass of light,and illuminating the circular cloud formation of this swirling circular mass,again i observed this for about 10-15 seconds,when it blinked out.Each time it disappeared,the stars that were visble before its appearance came into view,but again ,disappeared when this thing burst open.All that was visible in the sky directly in front of us was this giant ring of clouded light,and its dark centre.I observed this happen about 5 times in total,each time slowly going away from us,until we both went back in the house about 15-20 mins later.At no time could i see anything entering,or exiting out of the centre of this mass,nor did i have the common sense to go get my cell phone to try and video this,i was just awe struck by the event.My friend has'nt for whatever reason discussed this with me,or made any comment on this nights events.My friends house backs onto wooded farmland,in a semi rural area,street lighting,and village pollution lighting is minimal at the back of the house,tho this is on the flight path to glasgow airport.I presume that anyone else who may have been around and out that night may have seen a similair event to me,but as yet i have'nt heard anyone discuss this.
yours sincerely
mr eric cunningham
content.summary: Einstien rosen bridge

content.detailedDescription:
Since 2 nights ago i've been alert while i am sleeping, because i've been feeling observed; this hasn't let me sleep more than 2 continious hours.

this 3rd night, i fall slept at 2am aprox and i suddently woke up very confused at 3:00 am exactly when i noticed that my proximity sensor was activated, but the sensor was disabled since a month ago.

the functionality is to play an alarm when the sensor moves away from my mobile phone. the mobile phone and the sensor connect by bluetooth. the sensor is attached my car and house keys. the bluetooth was disabled in my phone, so in theory, nothing can turn on the alarm sensor.

at 3:00am exactly in july 28th 2016, i was woke up by a blinking light and a sound 'bip' that started like 3 short bips every 4-5 seconds and changing frequency each 30 seconds aprox. it sounded like morse code. i turned the light next to me and i realized it was my proximity sensor.
i took my mobile phone, that was next to me, to turn the sensor off, but as i mentioned, bt was not enabled and when i did enabled the bt, the sensor was not detected by me phone. i was shocked, and i reached the sensor to restart but it didn't work. 
confused and shocked just holded the sensor in my hand and at 3:06  aprox it stoped making the morse code sounds, suddenly it was detected from my mobile phone and working perfectly.

the morse code sounds that the sensor made are not configured, if the alarm of the sensor goes on it has a different frequency, a more harmonious one.
content.summary: Activation of proximity bluetooth sensor for 6 min and confusion

content.detailedDescription: Was sky watching then noticed 2 gold colored orbs in the nw sky. slowly they pulsed their way to a pretty steady speed before changing direction and disappearing. then noticed triangle formations with each point a copper gold shine or light i watched them and they appeared to be affected by the breeze hovering side to side, thought it might be my head moving while observing, sure enough they were swaying more or less when i layed down in grass and was able to keep my head from moving. saw 3 or 4 of these formations, one slowly got smaller  until i couldnt see it anymore and other ones i dont know, the last and biggest one is still in the nw sky, it makes my stomach hurt with anxiety if anyone wants to know
content.summary: Series of triangle formations all generaly pointed same direction less a couple

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of 07/27/16 at approx. 9:30 - 9:40 p.M my husband was walking our dog on the corner of mira loma and santa ana in reno, nv and observed in the southern night sky: 2 ball like bright white lights traveling closely together, that flashed red/green and white, sparks with trailing tails like comets but traveling very very slowly across a clear dark night sky.  he saw this for perhaps a minute before they traveled out of sight.  didn't have a cell on him to take a picture.  he thought it might be space junk?? as it appeared there were pieces falling off of these lights or objects.  or it could be something else...  traveling too slowly for a comet or a meteor. i'm commenting because these were apparently sighted in az, ca and los vegas nv. and perhaps other places as well, and all tonight.
content.summary: 2 balls of light throwing off red/green sparks with tails 7/27/16 reno, nevada

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog as i do every night around the same time. i saw the light behind the trees and assumed it was a plane flying low until it came out from behind the trees that were approximately 70 feet tall. the object looked like a meteor with it's trail that struck me the most. the entire object looked like sparks. it maneuvered around trees, buildings, power lines, and homes. when i saw the movements i thought something was off so i tried to run after where i thought it would land or crash. nothing was there so i continued to search the area for about an hour.  i was in shock because i've seen strange things like this that seem to be getting stranger as time goes on, but nothing like this.  i got tired when i was looking for it and became kind of dizzy. i thought it might have something to do with the black substance emitted from the object, which was not smoke so i went home. i lost sight of the object when it went below the tree line one street over and when i ran to the next street where it appeared to be descending, it was gone.
content.summary: Fireball with trail of sparks that left residue of blake substance in air

content.detailedDescription: We where walking on the side walk late at night and me and my sister saw a big glowing orb with what looked like a fire trail and the about 30 seconds later it spilt into at least 50  pieces and what was strange none of the pieces feel from where they split, almost like flying in a formation. as low as they where and how large they where they would of crashed into the   wasatch  mountains but soon  disappeared and i wasn't able to see it. we thought possible a plane or a  satellite. never where sure. i felt clam but nervous at the same time because it looked to big to not crash into the cities below. we all lost site of it when it went behind trees.
content.summary: It was like a big glowing ball, and split into smaller  pieces but none fell, almost like a  satellite

content.detailedDescription: I was saying outside smoking a cigarette and taking advantage of the lack of light pollution and admiring satellites. over my head crossed a three light triangular object. it was flashing red and white lights each in a triangular pattern. i ran inside to grab my friend to observe. she came out and quickly dismissed it as a plane. albeit a silent plane flying much higher than 20000 feet. suddenly she said what's that! i looked over only to see a bright, glowing light about the star of a pea or small bean held at arms length slowly creeping across the sky. it was headed ne but was changing direction from side to side while maintaining a path due ne. my friend asked if we should take a picture but told her it's like taking a picture of the moon and will just be a small white dot. hardly verifiable evidence. i watched the object move slowly ne for about two minutes until it disappeared behind trees.
content.summary: Bright round light the size of a bean of held at arms length no flashing lights changed direction side to side

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car on the third story parking structure getting ready to head home from work. i saw something out of the corner of my eye (to my left) and nothing an object flying through the sky that appeared to be on fire. at first i thought it was an airplane on fire. then on closer inspection it had a long red/flaming trail and as i watched it slowly continue on a straight path the object spilt into two objects. both objects had the bright red flaming trails and continued to stay on the exact same path. they didn't deter from their course and remained side by side the entire time. i eventually lost the objects behind a building. the event lasted for 1 minute and 20 seconds and right after i saw the objects i heard a helicopter flying over head towards the directions of the objects.
content.summary: An object appeared to be on fire flying through the sky and then spilt into two objects

content.detailedDescription: I was in the driveway on the phone, i turned to the street north of me and noticed an object flying across the sky. it seemed to have fire coming from the rear of it, and was going to crash; traveling slowly heading east.
content.summary: Two balls of fire flying across sky, couldn't make out shape but left smoke and fire trail
